LayoutNode.Content: Apple Watch Series 4 (GPS + Cellular) requires an iPhone 6 or later with iOS 12 or later. Wireless service plan required for cellular service. Apple Watch and iPhone service provider must be the same. Not all service providers support enterprise accounts; check with your employer and service provider. Roaming is not available outside your carrier network coverage area. Contact your service provider for more details. Check www.apple.com/watch/cellular for participating wireless carriers and eligibility.
LayoutNode.SRC: Apple Watch Series 4 (GPS + Cellular) requires an iPhone 6 or later with iOS 12 or later. Wireless service plan required for cellular service. Apple Watch and iPhone service provider must be thesame. Not all service providers support enterprise accounts; check with your employer and service provider. Roaming is not available outside your carrier network coverage area. Contact yourservice provider for more details. Check www.apple.com/watch/cellular for participating wireless carriers and eligibility.

LayoutNode.Content: Apple Watch Series 4 (GPS) requires an iPhone 5s or later with iOS 12 or later.
LayoutNode.SRC: Apple Watch Series 4 (GPS) requires an iPhone 5s or later with iOS 12 or later.

LayoutNode.Content: Apple Watch Series 4 has a water resistance rating of 50 meters under ISO standard 22810:2010. This means that it may be used for shallow-water activities like swimming in a pool or ocean. However, Apple Watch Series 4 should not be used for scuba diving, waterskiing, or other activities involving high-velocity water or submersion below shallow depth.
LayoutNode.SRC: Apple Watch Series 4 has a water resistance rating of 50 meters under ISO standard 22810:2010. This means that it may be used for shallow-water activities like swimming in a pool or ocean. However, Apple Watch Series 4 should not be used for scuba diving, waterskiing, or other activities involving high-velocity water or submersion below shallow depth.Apple Watch Series 4 has a water resistance rating of 50 meters under ISO standard 22810:2010. This means that it may be used for shallow-water activities like swimming in a pool or ocean. However, Apple Watch Series 4 should not be used for scuba diving, waterskiing, or other activities involving high-velocity water or submersion below shallow depth.

LayoutNode.Content: Leather and stainless steel bands are not water resistant.
LayoutNode.SRC: Leather and stainless steel bands are not water resistant.
